rationale: SecureFile Encryption (user) requires a license for Oracle Advanced Security to use.
recommended_action: Do not use the "STORE AS SECUREFILE" with the "ENCRYPT" option when creating a table with a LOB column.  Disable it after the fact with the "DECRYPT" option to "ALTER TABLE ... STORE AS SECUREFILE"
error_message: SecureFile Encryption (user) is listed as a feature usage concern under Oracle Advanced Security
